summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department; authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington, Planning and Community Affairs Agency, for a grant for a Community Based Crime Prevention Program (Grant Award Contract No. 767) in the Meany-Madrona and Leschi Schools attendance areas; authorizing a contract with Seattle School District No. 1 in connection therewith; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
